skills.skill: Order to Cash and Supply Chain Management

duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver remote/onsite services with technical and/or application expert knowledge, focusing on system optimization and conceptual planning.
Take full responsibility for the quality of team delivered tasks and be accountable for the overall success.
Understand customer requirements, convert into a project plan, articulate it to stakeholders, and execute the plan successfully.
Work closely with SAP Development and other SAP Teams to assist customers and find appropriate solutions.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 2 years of industry and SAP product experience in key areas such as Order to Cash or Supply Chain Management.
Hands-on experience with S/4HANA customizing and/or development tasks is a must.
Fluent in English with good communication and presentation skills to convince customers and other stakeholders based on facts.
Quick learner with strong analytical and logical skills.
